description: Accumulate text input over multiple executions. Each new input gets concatenated to the existing content with an optional delimiter.

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Text to append to the scratch pad. Each execution adds this to the accumulated content.

inputs.name: delimiter
inputs.description: Optional delimiter to insert between text additions (e.g., '\n', ' - ', ', ')

inputs.name: clear
inputs.description: Set to true to clear the scratch pad and start fresh

outputs.name: length
outputs.description: Number of characters in the accumulated content

settings.name: initial_content
settings.description: Starting content for the scratch pad

settings.name: default_delimiter
settings.description: Default delimiter to use between text additions
